actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: To provide a general statute of limitations for civil actions arising under Federal law.
short_title: Civil Statute of Limitations Act of 1989

summary.text: Civil Statute of Limitations Act of 1989 - Amends the Federal judicial code to provide that, except as otherwise provided by law, a civil action arising under an Act of Congress may not be commenced later than ten years after the cause of action accrues.

titles.title: Civil Statute of Limitations Act of 1989
To provide a general statute of limitations for civil actions arising under Federal law.
